channel.title: Login Interface
channel.description:
Whenever I log in, Id like either of these interfaces to pop up. A tutorial on how to make this happen would be nice, Or even if this is already added on my client would be even nicer. I have a 317 with 602 Anims-Gfx-Npc's, and 634 Items. REP ++ Will be done aswell if it works...
[b]This is the Image:[/b] [img]http://meta.filesmelt.com/downloader.php?file=Welcomescrean.png[/img] [b]Or this one:[/b] [img]http://i1075.photobucket.com/albums/w426/IMakeTheLedgeEnd/LoginMessage.jpg[/img]
Thank you for your time... Sincerely, Trade me
